messages.subject: WW2 Japanese Diplomats sword
messages.msgSnippet: Hello All, I have an opportunity to buy a mint WW2 Japanese Diplomats sword with Kiri mon, and ivy type engraving on the blade with a kiri mon as well. It is
messages.messageBody:
Hello All,

I have an opportunity to buy a mint WW2 Japanese Diplomats sword with
Kiri mon, and ivy type engraving on the blade with a kiri mon as well.

It is actually the same type of blade as listed in Fuller and
Gregory's book.

Anyone have an idea of its worth?

Thanks for your help.

Louis Skebo
